question: Refer to the figure <image 1>, which term best describes the dynamics of children and their relationships with parents and siblings?
description: The image depicts a cartoon family consisting of five characters and a dog. The family includes two adults, one male and one female, and three children. The male adult has brown hair and is wearing a white shirt and green pants. The female adult has blonde hair and is wearing a green shirt and brown pants. One child has blonde hair and is wearing a blue shirt and red pants. Another child has brown hair and is wearing a pink shirt and blue pants. The third child has blonde hair and is wearing a yellow hat and blue shirt. The dog is white with a red collar. The family appears to be standing together in a close group, suggesting a close-knit relationship.
